articles.title: Maldives shelters sanctioned Russian billionaires' yachts - Reuters
articles.description: A day after coal and fertilizer billionaire Andrey Melnichenko was placed on the European Union's sanctions list on March 9, his superyacht Motor Yacht A stopped broadcasting its location while in Maldives' waters, maritime data shows.
